analysis.description:
KJC (/unique_chucks/36/0xa42868496e6b98d655e4a820801d8df8f4abe2b3.sol#7-164) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/36/0xa42868496e6b98d655e4a820801d8df8f4abe2b3.sol#70-75)

KJC.fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0xa42868496e6b98d655e4a820801d8df8f4abe2b3.sol#126-161) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- divineHash[0] == 0 || divineHash[0] == 1
	- divineHash[0] == 0 || divineHash[0] == 1

KJC.fallback (/unique_chucks/36/0xa42868496e6b98d655e4a820801d8df8f4abe2b3.sol#126-161) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (divineHash[1] & 0x04 != 0) (/unique_chucks/36/0xa42868496e6b98d655e4a820801d8df8f4abe2b3.sol#140-143)
